events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer role, highlighting strong experience in full stack development and cloud technologies.
Application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software, developer, and DevOps mentioned in the CV.
Recruiter Sarah was assigned to manage the candidateâ€™s journey, ensuring timely communication and coordination through the process.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call; the candidate demonstrated solid knowledge in backend systems and eagerness to work with Kubernetes.
Candidate responded promptly to availability requests and confirmed interest in proceeding to the technical interview stage, expressing enthusiasm for the role.
Technical interview was scheduled for the candidate to discuss system design and coding skills with the engineering team next Monday morning.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, impressing the panel with their problem-solving approach and depth of programming knowledge.
Following the positive technical interview outcome, the HR interview was scheduled to discuss cultural fit and benefits alignment.
Candidate had a positive HR interview, expressing alignment with company values and clear understanding of role expectations.
An official offer was proposed to the candidate including competitive salary, benefits, and professional development opportunities.
Candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team and contributing to projects.
The candidate formally accepted the offer, confirming their start date and readiness to begin onboarding activities as scheduled.
Onboarding process has begun smoothly with the candidate completing necessary documentation and starting introductory sessions about the company.
The hire process was officially closed after successful onboarding and initial week integration within the engineering team.
